title: "Pakistan’s stance on Afghanistan getting recognition: FM Qureshi"
excerpt: "Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi on Saturday said that Pakistan’s stance on the prevailing situation in Afghanistan was “growingly getting recognition,” with the world joining its voice. He was talking to reporters at Parliament House after examining the arrangements for the 17th Extraordinary Session of the Council of Foreign Ministers of the Organization of Islamic Cooperation,"
